title: Back In the Atmosphere (feat. Ralph Sutton)
description:
Ralph Sutton joins The Bonfire as the summer of soft rock continues with Jay telling him about the Blues Traveler, Jewel & Train concert from the night before!

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM
